original_title: ชิมิโกะ แบล็คเบอร์รี่
overview: Shimiko is a time traveler from the future looking for her father who turns out to be a gay transvestite in the past. She must figure a way to make him straight and attracted to women so that he can become her future father. But she is not supposed to meddle with the past like this and a time cop is on her heels to apprehend her back to her own time.
title: Shimiko Blackberry
